intro: Tithymalus triflorus subsp. kerneri, commonly known as the Kern's tithymalus, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to the mountainous regions of Central Asia. Due to its limited distribution and specific ecological requirements, it is considered a rare and endangered species in many regions.
